articles.description: What Dravid did was ensure that every youngster with skill and commitment got a fair shot. People who have worked with the teams, or been a part of the teams, say that under his supervision, both skills and perseverance are given equal importance.
articles.content: Five years ago, in front of aspiring engineers at Kolkatas Jadavpur University, a man with the first hint of grey in his sideburns walked on to a manicured cricket ground. Leased to the Cricket Assoc… [+10265 chars]

articles.title: Aiden Markram tries to connect the dots between Africa and Asia, South Africa cricket tour of Pakistan, 2021 | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
articles.description: The South Africa opener, who faced 224 deliveries for his 74 in the second innings, said it was a small step in the right direction
articles.content: Africa isn't Asia. Asia isn't Africa. Contrasting conditions are part of what makes Test cricket so intriguing. For aficionados, at least. For players, it's more like trying not to make an idiot of y… [+4361 chars]
